channel.title: Sexuality-IAT on Project Implicit's International Sites
channel.description: Recent content in Sexuality-IAT on Project Implicit's International Sites

item.title: Biases in Israel
item.author: mayanna@post.bgu.ac.il (Project Implicit)
item.description: nall <- nrow(race) + nrow(skin) + nrow(ethnic) + nrow(age) + nrow(weight) + nrow(sexuality) + nrow(usa) + nrow(gender_science) The Israeli site offers eight IAT topics for the participants to complete: Race: ‘Black - White’ IAT (N = 4454) Ethnicity: ‘Ashkenazi - Mizrahi’ IAT (N = 9105) Skin-tone: ‘Light Skin - Dark Skin’ IAT (N = 3639) Age: ‘Young - Old’ IAT (N = 3203) Sexuality: ‘Gay - Straight’ IAT (N = 6506) Weight: ‘Fat - Thin’ IAT (N = 5209) Nationalism: ‘USA - Own Country’ IAT (N = 2167) Gender - Science: ‘Male+Science - Female+Liberal arts’ IAT (N = 5709) Each tasks also included 1-2 self-reported evaluation measures:

item.title: Analysis of Israel's data
item.author: mayanna@post.bgu.ac.il (Project Implicit)
